title: Our neighbour Nepal
brief_description: Nepal, homeland of the Gurkha soldiers. Its people and rulers, customs, homes, palaces, religious shrines and temples; the King and government; the Ranas, a ruling clique; the disturbances of 1950 and the King’s flight to India; his return and the subsequent visit of Nehru to Katmandu.
